description: This file defines a Java interface for a User repository that extends Spring Data JPA's JpaRepository, providing database access methods for UserEntity objects.
external_methods: JpaRepository's standard methods (save, delete, findAll, etc.)

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing UserEntity entities, with a custom method to find users by their identification number.

methods.name: findByIdentificationNumber
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the UserEntity with the specified identification number, if found.
